articles.title: Sri Lanka and USAID discuss future cooperation
articles.description: President Anura Kumara Dissanayake said that he had a productive virtual discussion today with USAID Administrator Samantha Power, exploring future cooperation and how USAID can support Sri Lanka s development initiatives.

articles.title: New Democratic Front s National List released
articles.description: The New Democratic Front (NDF) has released its National List for the 2024 General Election. MORE..

articles.title: Japanese atomic bomb survivor group Nihon Hidankyo awarded Nobel Peace Prize
articles.description: Japanese organisation Nihon Hidankyo, a grassroots movement of atomic bomb survivors from Hiroshima and Nagasaki also known as Hibakusha, won the Nobel Peace Prize on Friday. MORE..

articles.title: Crown of Goddess Kali, gifted by PM Modi, stolen from Bangladesh temple
articles.description: A crown of goddess Kali has been stolen from the Jeshoreshwari temple in Satkhira s Shyamnagar. MORE..

articles.title: 18 injured after two buses collide on Colombo-Kandy road
articles.description: Two buses have reportedly collided along the Colombo â€“ Kandy main road this morning (11) resulting in injuries to at least 18 passengers. MORE..
